poem.title: Shipley
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: In drystane crannies snowflakes flock and sheep with stain of moss and stone on snowy fells. Ice makes dice from dalebones. Shivered whins are fivestanes the sky plays. It rocks stones, collapses crouching arches, in rage attacks the stellar slide within stone, and rugs at baffled, battled hearts.
